item.title: Mpich2_安装 Ubuntu 20.04LTS
item.description: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS sudo aptitude install mpich mpiexec --version image-20201117092421973 new code #include "mpi.h"#include <stdio.h> int main(void) { int rankID; int sizeNum; MPI_Init(0, 0); MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &sizeNum); MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &rankID); printf("Hello world! %d of total = %d\n", rankID, sizeNum); MPI_Finalize(); return 0; } mpicc demo_1.c -o demo_1 mpirun -np 8 ./demo_1
